sql.query: SELECT TRD_DD, CLSPRC, CODE FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE IN (${code}) AND TRD_DD BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY TRD_DD

SELECT TRD_DD, CLSPRC, CODE FROM ( SELECT TRD_DD, CODE, CLSPRC, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CODE ORDER BY CODE, TRD_DD DESC) RN FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE IN (${code}) AND TRD_DD <= ? ) WHERE RN <= 100 ORDER BY CODE,TRD_DD
SELECT TRD_DD, CLSPRC, CODE FROM CHART_TEST_DATA WHERE CODE IN (${code}) AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRD_DD,'YYYYMMDD'),'D') = 2 ORDER BY CODE,TRD_DD

SELECT a.TRD_DD, a.CLSPRC, a.CODE FROM CHART_TEST_DATA a, (SELECT MIN(TRD_DD) TRD_DD FROM SCOTT.CHART_TEST_DATA GROUP BY SUBSTR(TRD_DD,1,6)) b WHERE a.TRD_DD = b.TRD_DD AND a.CODE IN (${code}) ORDER BY a.CODE, a.TRD_DD
